Banner.Title: Sanyam Malik
Banner.Description: I'm a software engineer with over 4 years of experience, specializing in developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions. I pride myself on my ability to translate project requirements into visually appealing and efficient solutions. Currently, I'm employed at ClayHR, where I focus on building accessible, human-centered products.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Hey there, I'm Sanyam Malik. I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and currently exploring the world of Web App Design and Development. Throughout my career, I've been involved in various large-scale projects, prioritizing responsive design, performance optimization, and cross-functional collaboration. I love turning a project's 'wish list' into something that not only looks great but also performs well.

On a typical day, you'll find me working hand-in-hand with backend engineers on API integrations, turning designs into actual, clickable things, and squashing bugs with our QA team. I'm all about teamwork, taking ownership of what I do, and always looking for ways to help others grow in their roles, too.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
AboutMe.conclude: So that's a bit about me. Can't wait to bring my skills and passion to some more exciting projects!
Experience.Title: Where I've Worked

Profiles.Title: Senior Software Enginner
Description: Orchestrated seamless integration with five leading third-party platforms, resulting in a 35% increase in application submissions and broadening the ATS system's reach
Elevated functionality and user experience of the ClayHR Jobboard Google Chrome extension through strategic enhancements and refinements
Spearheaded the development and maintenance of the company's WordPress plugin, empowering clients and contributing to a 30% rise in user adoption of the ATS system's capabilities
Innovated the architectural design for Angular applications, implementing robust UI testing methodologies
Conducted performance assessments, provided strategic guidance, mentorship, and fostered a collaborative and efficient team environment

Profiles.Title: Software Enginner
Description: Developed over 4 Angular Applications, employing modular design by centralizing common components into libraries within the nx workspace.
Leveraged Java/Spring frameworks to architect and develop scalable web applications and microservices, resulting in a 30% improvement in system performance and responsiveness.
Led efforts to ensure the quality and reliability of software solutions, resulting in a 15% reduction in post-deployment issues and enhancing overall system stability.
Optimized interaction with microservices' API endpoints using Spring Data and JPA, resulting in a 25% decrease in API response time and improving overall system efficiency.

Profiles.Title: Software Enginner - Intern
Description: Actively engaged in over 10 targeted training sessions and workshops, staying up-to-date on industry trends and gaining valuable knowledge.
Undertook key responsibilities in active projects, including conducting research and data collection.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams of developers and managers, consistently meeting 100% of Service Level Agreements (SLAs) on time, thereby preventing any spillovers in critical deadlines

FeatureProjects.Title: Some Things I've Built
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Aperio CAS Clone
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Central Authentication Server, a key component in user authentication for accessing specific services akin to Aperio CAS, employs a dual-database approach. One database is dedicated to reading user information, while the other handles token storage. This design ensures efficiency and separation of concerns in managing user credentials and authentication tokens. The API server supports multiple password encoders, such as BCRYPT, SCRYPT, NoOp, PBKDF2, Sha256, MD5, providing flexibility in implementing robust security measures. Notably, the server is configured to return responses identical to those of the original Aperio CAS server, ensuring seamless integration and interoperability within a broader authentication ecosystem.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Applicant Tracking System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The ATS (Applicant Tracking System) is a versatile tool designed to seamlessly integrate into existing HR ecosystems. With a focus on streamlining recruitment, the system brings efficiency to the process through features such as resume parsing, collaborative hiring workflows, and automated screening tools. Notably, it excels in facilitating third-party portal integrations, seamlessly connecting with popular platforms like Indeed, Google, Careerjet, and more. Additionally, the system is adept at candidate background verification integrations, with seamless connections to services such as Checkr and Compufact. This capability further enhances the recruitment process, ensuring a comprehensive and unified experience for organizations in managing candidate information and background checks. The adaptable system continues to provide a user-friendly interface for both recruiters and candidates, promoting a positive and efficient talent acquisition process.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Ang-PI
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Angular Pi-Hole(AngPI) Angular Single Page Application (SPA) specifically designed for Pi-Hole (https://pi-hole.net/). This application comes with enhanced database support, allowing users to easily customize and manage their Pi-Hole configurations. The Angular SPA ensures a responsive and dynamic user interface, while the elevated database integration provides flexibility for personalized settings and blacklists. This project seamlessly combines Angular's capabilities, Pi-Hole's functionality, and advanced database features, delivering an intuitive and customizable solution for effective ad blocking.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Candidate Portal
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This dedicated platform serves as a central hub, empowering candidates to seamlessly navigate and oversee various aspects of their career journey. From tracking application statuses to engaging in real-time communication with hiring teams, the Candidate Portal enhances transparency and collaboration. With an intuitive design, candidates can effortlessly access updates on job applications and receive feedback. This not only streamlines the communication process but also fosters a more engaged and informed candidate experience. The Candidate Portal in career management acts as a valuable tool, ensuring candidates have the tools and resources they need to navigate their career paths effectively.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: PiFlask
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Python Flask API Server for Pi-Hole stands out as an innovative project, leveraging the power of the Flask framework to provide a scalable and efficient solution for managing Pi-Hole instances. Notably, it incorporates an elevated database system, allowing users to personalize settings, blacklists, and configurations for a tailored experience. The API documentation, powered by Swagger, ensures a user-friendly interface for developers, while the integration of JSON Web Tokens (JWT) enhances security by restricting access to authenticated users. This project combines functionality, customization, and security to elevate the Pi-Hole experience for both developers and end-users.

OtherProjects.Title: Other Noteworthy Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Job Scraper
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This Python script is designed to scrape job listings from a specified websites and extract relevant information such as job titles, companies, and locations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Heimdall Angular-Flask Stack
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Converted Heimdall Dashboard from PHP to Angular + Python Flask Applications.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: School Management System
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This project is based on spring 3 with spring security 6. The main purpose of this project is to build the spring web application from scratch and securing it with jwt using custom password encoders.

Blogs.Title: Posts that you may love

Blogs.Items.Title: Setting up your first home server
Blogs.Items.Description: Unlock the world of home server ownership with our step-by-step guide! Learn to choose hardware, install your operating system, and set up essential services for a secure and personalized home server experience. Perfect for beginners, this guide makes server setup easy and accessible.

Blogs.Items.Title: Accessing your home server from anywhere
Blogs.Items.Description: Discover the freedom of accessing your home server from anywhere with our comprehensive guide. Whether you're on the go or working remotely, learn the essential steps to set up secure and seamless remote access.

Blogs.Items.Title: Proprietary v/s OpenSource
Blogs.Items.Description: Dive into the debate between Proprietary and Open Source software with our insightful guide.Gain a deeper understanding to make informed choices for your projects and discover the dynamic balance between innovation, collaboration, and control in the realm of software solutions.

Videos.Title: Videos that worth a watch
Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
Testimonial.Title: Other's impressions of me

Testimonial.Items.Comment: Indeed Apply is a KEY integration for us. Sanyam has remained focused on it, and continues to remain focused on it so we can onboard more customers. There are many optimizations to make, and Sanyam is continuing to work on it with focus and dedication.
Testimonial.Items.Name: Amrinder Arora

Testimonial.Items.Comment: Congratulations on the fantastic work that you have done in Checkr Integration. It is great to see your commitment and enthusiasm toward your work. Your efforts are greatly appreciated and I look forward to seeing more of your brilliance in our upcoming work. Thanks again for your contributions. Keep up the good work!
Testimonial.Items.Name: Chinki Dhiman

Testimonial.Items.Comment: Our customers depend on the WP plugin to publish the jobs from the Applicant Tracking System to their website! Sanyam acted very quickly in getting the plugin reactivated. he was also able to upgrade and test it with the right version of WordPress to ensure compatibility with the latest standards!
Testimonial.Items.Name: Amrinder Arora
